body_html:
As per: https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_mac - GPUs-on-Macs are not supported by the TensorFlow team (since after version 1.2).

Some more discussion is here: https://groups.google.com/a/tensorflow.org/d/msg/discuss/BbnxAK9Rc54/XeTIG7JsBQAJ

body:
As per: https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_mac - GPUs-on-Macs are not supported by the TensorFlow team (since after version 1.2).

Some more discussion is here: https://groups.google.com/a/tensorflow.org/d/msg/discuss/BbnxAK9Rc54/XeTIG7JsBQAJ
